text: Alrighty, so I am seeing on this page: <https://offers.HubSpot.com/countdown-to-may-25th> that HS is using firebase for the thumbs up and down ranking. Does anyone have any info on a "how to" for implementing something like this?
granted it uses angular but might be able to figure it out from there
looks like all javascript. No special HubSpot integration
There's also a Vue handler that may be helpful, just saying :wink: <https://github.com/vuejs/vuefire>
i should check that out, I tried to use firebase a bit and while it wasn’t hard some basics had me a little confused. If this abstracts that and makes it easier to work with in vue that’d be fun
